ai-tha-ap290:0.3_0: if it is the purpose of going forth (therefore) the Rains Retreat in the heart
ai-tha-ap290:1.4_0: what belongs to different Buddhist sect is.
ai-tha-ap290:2.1_0: Having gone forth, she went to the homeless life,
ai-tha-ap290:2.3_0: Sentient beings are born in that place.
ai-tha-ap290:3.3_0: I’m not aware of any living creatures.
ai-tha-ap290:3.4_0: This is the fruit of going forth.
ai-tha-ap290:4.1_0: Seven measures have been strayed for seven eons.
ai-tha-ap290:4.2_0: Seven such a one is worshipped.
ai-tha-ap290:6.1_0: That is how these verses were recited by the senior venerable Senior.
ai-tha-ap290:7.1_0: Eight days in the eighth day of the fortnight.
